1: I call out and I am heard.
2: I seek help and find enduring comfort and healing.
3: Pausing to remember restores calm and strengthens the spirit.
4: I remain watchful in peaceful silence.
5: I study the past to choose wisely today.
6: I gain wisdom through night song, inner reflection, diligent searching.
7: Enduring compassion stays; favor continues through every season.
8: Mercy endures forever and the promise holds true forever
9: Grace and compassion remain open and active.
10: I remember steadfast care and strength guiding me.
11: I remember timeless wonders and strengthen grateful resolve.
12: I meditate on noble deeds and gladly tell their stories.
13: Follow the sacred way; the greatest guides us.
14: Wonders abound, strength shines among all people.
15: Mighty power delivers and restores people.
16: Divine presence opens a path through the deep.
17: Storm rains nourish life as thunder and lightning herald renewal.
18: Lightning illuminates the world; the earth awakens in wonder.
19: A guiding path leads through vast waters with sure direction.
20: Wise, unified leaders gently shepherd the people.
